node.title: If you support Taiwan's independence, China won't let you into the mainland, Hong Kong, or Macau
node.description: The Chinese government says it has drawn up a list of people who support Taiwan's independence.
node.content: ["China says it will make people who support Taiwan independence criminally liable for life, a spokeswoman for China's Taiwan Affairs Office has said.", "The country will not allow people who support Taiwan's independence to enter the mainland, Hong Kong or Macau.", "China has drawn up a list of people who are \"stubbornly pro-Taiwan independence\", according to a \"question and answer\" issued by the office.", "It says it will enforce punishment on the people on the list\u00a0by not letting them enter the mainland and China's Special Administrative Regions of Hong Kong and Macau, and forbidding them from benefiting monetarily from the mainland.", "The question of Taiwanese sovereignty is sensitive in China.", "The Chinese government considers Taiwan a wayward province and seeks \"peaceful reunification\".", "Taiwan has been seeking to join the United Nations, but China has blocked the attempt, saying Taiwan is not sovereign but a part of China.", "The island is currently self-administered\u00a0and has\u00a0complained for over a year of repeated Chinese air force incursions into its Air Defence Identification Zone (ADIZ), many in record numbers.", "A delegation consisting of members of the European Parliament is wrapping up a three-day visit to Taiwan today, amid a recent push by Taiwan to deepen its ties with democracies in the EU.", "Reuters/ABC"]
